data.comment: The match is underway in Zwolle.
The home team has substituted Bram Van Polen with Destan Bajselmani. John Stegeman is thus making his first change.
In the minute 45, Clint Leemans (Zwolle) has received a yellow card from Martin Perez.
Willem II's Mike Tresor Ndayishimiye has been booked in Zwolle.
In the minute 46, The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
The away team replace Che Nunnely with John Yeboah.
Robbin Ruiter (Willem II) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Jorn Brondeel.
In the minute 66, Adrie Koster is making the team's third substitution at Mac3Park Stadion with Gorkem Saglam replacing Mats Kohlert.
Jesper Drost is replacing Clint Leemans for the home team.
Victor Van den Bogert is on a sub for Leeroy Owusu for Willem II.
In the minute 82, Willem II make their fifth substitution with Ole Romeny replacing Mike Tresor Ndayishimiye.
Mustafa Saymak is booked for the home team.
He's off! Mustafa Saymak is shown a second yellow card.
That's full-time at Mac3Park Stadion. The final score is 0-0.
Rico Strieder is replacing Eliano Reijnders for Zwolle at Mac3Park Stadion.
